washing the dishes: can you please wash the dishes
can you clean up the dishes?
can you take care of the dishes?
making bed: can you please make the bed?
taking out the trash: can you throw the trash out?
can you take out the trash?
vacuuming: do you mind bringing out the hoover and doing some cleaning?
cooking food: can you make me some food?
doing laundry: please take care of my laundry
dusting: can you remove all the dust from the shelves?
